Class: DateRange

Suit.Components. DateRange

This is the Suit framework date range.

new DateRange()

  • Suit.Components

Members

events

Events

Methods

predefinedSelected()

If a predefined value is selected (from the select), then we have to trigger or change the picker values.

selectedStart()

Selects the end date based on the start date (is sequencial) and focuses on end date.
